about_the_game:
It is the year 1983, a month has passed since the end of the Great War. The situation in the territories of the former Republic of Kagastam remains tense. The remnants of General Morin's army are engaged in bloody battles with representatives of the new regime. As an experienced war veteran, you are appointed as the commander of an outpost located at the very heart of the ongoing conflict.

World

Explore the conquered territories of Kagastam, draped in an autumnal landscape. Visit new locations such as the Village of Czereniewka, the Abandoned Railway Station, or the State Agricultural Farm.

Drivers

Post-war legal reforms have allowed women to cross the borders of Acaristan! Additionally, professional drivers and state diplomats, equipped with special document sets, will be visiting the checkpoint.

Police Dog

Trained dogs will be assigned to all border police teams. These loyal animals will assist in detecting hidden contraband and boost the morale of the units.

Contraband

To fund their war efforts, Kagastam partisans have developed a complex smuggling network. Recently, their loot has included gold and works of art. They are also involved in smuggling banned propaganda films aimed at mobilizing new supporters.

Vehicles

In their benevolence, the authorities of Acaristan have launched bus lines in the conquered territories. For these vehicles, all passengers are subject to inspection. Additionally, new passenger cars can be expected at the border.

Stealth Attacks

Eliminate enemies without raising the alarm! Effectively use terrain covers, such as dense bushes or building ruins, to avoid detection and complete missions with full discretion.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages: Occasional violence or brutality, vulgar and explicit language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD RX 560 (3GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 @ 3.6 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 @ 3.6 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 (6GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
